tweets.text: ...I still lean towards Blockchain awaits its netscape moment. Stage is set for high-throughput infrastructure such that a real DAPP can be run smoothly. Now it's up to the entrepreneurs to prove this nascent industry not just only sound and fury that signifies nothing.
RT @blockbuster: Tweet why you’re leaving Netflix. The top three most creative tweets using #GoodbyeNetflix will win a 1-year subscription…
